#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int T;
    string str,in,rev;
    vector<char> whole;
    
    cin >> T;
    getline(cin,str);
    
    while(T--)
    {
     str=in=rev="";
     getline(cin,str);
     stringstream a(str);
     while(a >> in)
     {
       int len=0;
       len = in.length()-1;
       for(int i=len;i>=-1;i--)
         {
           if(i==-1)
           whole.push_back(' ');
           else
           whole.push_back(in[i]);
           }
           }
     int siz=0;
     siz = whole.size();
     for(int i=0;i<siz;i++)
       cout << whole[i];
       cout << endl;
       
       whole.clear();
       }
       
       return 0;
       //system("pause");
       }
